com.a2a.googlechart.charts
Class LineChart

java.lang.Object
  com.a2a.googlechart.charts.Chart
      com.a2a.googlechart.charts.LineChart

public class LineChart
extends Chart

Represents a line chart.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String MultiDataSet
          Represents a line chart, where a pair of data sets (x,y) is required for each line.
static java.lang.String SingleDataSet
          Represents a line chart, where data points are spaced evenly along the x-axis.

public static final java.lang.String SingleDataSet
Represents a line chart, where data points are spaced evenly along the x-axis.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MultiDataSet

public static final java.lang.String MultiDataSet
Represents a line chart, where a pair of data sets (x,y) is required for each line.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

LineChart

public LineChart(int width,
                 int height)
Creates a line chart with one line per dataset. Points are evenly spaced along the x-axis.

Parameters:
width - width in pixels
height - height in pixels

LineChart

public LineChart(int width,
                 int height,
                 java.lang.String lineChartType)
Creates a line chart pf the specified type.

Parameters:
width - width in pixels
height - height in pixels
lineChartType - specifies how the chart handles datasets
Method Detail

addLineStyle

public void addLineStyle(com.a2a.googlechart.charts.LineStyle lineStyle)
Applies a style to a line. Line styles are applied to lines in order, the first line will use the first line style.

Parameters:
lineStyle - LineStyle object
